div.p: This code system http://www.cms.gov/hcpcs-level-II-modifiers defines many codes, but they are not represented here

description.value: Healthcare Common Procedure Coding System (HCPCS) Procedure Code Modifiers

copyright.value: HCPCS modifiers are available at https://www.cms.gov/Medicare/Coding/HCPCSReleaseCodeSets/Alpha-Numeric-HCPCS.html. The link takes one to a list of files. The HCPCS ANWEB files include modifier and procedure codes. The target set for this Code System is the procedure code modifiers from this file. The code set is owned by CMS and is available for use.
